Docs.summary: A Method provides information about, and access to, a single method on a class or interface.

Docs.summary: Returns the default value for the annotation member represented by this Method instance.
Docs.value: the default value for the annotation member represented by this Method instance.

Docs.exception: if the annotation is of type and no definition can be found for the default class value.

Docs.summary: Returns a Type object that represents the formal return type of the method represented by this Method object.
Docs.value: a Type object that represents the formal return type of the underlying method

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the generic method signature does not conform to the format specified in <cite>The Java™ Virtual Machine Specification</cite>
if the underlying method's return type refers to a non-existent type declaration
if the underlying method's return typed refers to a parameterized type that cannot be instantiated for any reason

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Lang.Object Invoke (Java.Lang.Object obj, params Java.Lang.Object[] args);
.method public hidebysig instance class Java.Lang.Object Invoke(class Java.Lang.Object obj, class Java.Lang.Object[] args) cil managed

Docs.param: the object the underlying method is invoked from
the arguments used for the method call
Docs.summary: Invokes the underlying method represented by this Method object, on the specified object with the specified parameters.
Docs.returns: the result of dispatching the method represented by this object on obj with parameters args

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if this Method object is enforcing Java language access control and the underlying method is inaccessible.

if the method is an instance method and the specified object argument is not an instance of the class or interface declaring the underlying method (or of a subclass or implementor thereof); if the number of actual and formal parameters differ; if an unwrapping conversion for primitive arguments fails; or if, after possible unwrapping, a parameter value cannot be converted to the corresponding formal parameter type by a method invocation conversion.
if the underlying method throws an exception.
if the specified object is null and the method is an instance method.
if the initialization provoked by this method fails.

Docs.summary: Returns true if this method is a bridge method; returns false otherwise.
Docs.value: true if and only if this method is a bridge method as defined by the Java Language Specification.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns true if this method is a default method; returns false otherwise.
Docs.value: true if and only if this method is a default method as defined by the Java Language Specification.
